question: Can we recite Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Rajioon upon hearing the death of a Non Muslim?
answer:
QUESTION

 

if we heard that some nonmuslim die can we say innalilahhwainarajehon

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

Within every occurrence of life lies a lesson for man. The news of a death of a person whether Muslim or non-muslim, is an opportunity for us to remind ourselves of death. Hence it will be permissible to recite Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Rajioon.

(Fataawa Mahmoodiyya v8 pg486 Farooqi)

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum

Ml. Mohammed Moola,
